definitions.example: I wanted to go to the party, but I was denied.

definitions.definition: To assert that something is not true.
definitions.example: Everyone knows he committed the crime, but he still denies it.

definitions.definition: (ditransitive) To refuse to give or grant something to someone.
definitions.example: My father denied me a good education.

definitions.definition: To take something away from someone; to deprive of.
To disclaim connection with, responsibility for, etc.; to refuse to acknowledge; to disown; to abjure; to disavow.
To refuse (to do or accept something).
